thread.title: Watch New Lady Gaga John Wayne Music Video
thread.title_full: Watch New Lady Gaga John Wayne Music Video

author: Maggie Maloney
title: Watch New Lady Gaga John Wayne Music Video
text:
Lady Gaga Just Released Her Action-Packed Music Video for 'John Wayne' 
Mother Monster meets the Wild West. Emphasis on wild. Getty By Maggie Maloney Feb 9, 2017 It's been a huge week for Lady Gaga: she just gave the Super Bowl performance to end all Super Bowl performances and then announced her highly-anticipated world tour . But she still has more glorious surprises up her sleeve. Today, it's the music video for John Wayne . It's basically the most badass country music video we've ever seen. It starts off innocently enough, with Gaga playing the guitar in her now-signature pink cowboy suit, but it quickly transforms into a booze- and action-packed Wild West adventure. Think: Gaga yelling at a cowboy, lots of motorcycle and horseback riding, irresponsible car driving, and some dimly-lit dance numbers. There's also a pair of insanely high heeled boots that double as a machine gun, since this *is* Lady Gaga. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below The video was directed by Jonas Åkerlund, who previously teamed up with Gaga on the Paparazzi and Telephone music videos. After teasing this video on social media and releasing it on Apple Music, the John Wayne video has made it's way to Gaga's Vevo account today. Enjoy: Follow Marie Claire on F acebook for the latest celeb news, beauty tips, fascinating reads, livestream video, and more. More from Marie Claire:
